message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. This product is worth at least $800,000 to me, and I believe it holds the same value for you. I'm offering it to you for $850,000. This price reflects its significant worth, and I'm confident it will be a profitable investment for you. If you're not interested, I have another buyer lined up at $800,000, but I'd prefer to work with you if possible. Let me know your thoughts.
